articles.title: "A Marvel": Amitabh Bachchan Takes Coastal Road Tunnel In Mumbai - NDTV
articles.description: The video amassed more than 50,000 views within minutes and users posted many comments on the post.
articles.content:
The first phase of the tunnel on Coastal Road in Mumbai was inaugurated on March 11.
Actor Amitabh Bachchan has posted a video of using a tunnel on the newly-inaugurated Coastal Road in Mumbai that … [+1918 chars]
